description:

description:
Imbue an Ice Bullet with extra mana to make it break,
damaging and lowering AGI for all enemies for 3 turns.
name: Icy Shot X
note:

<Learn Cost: 25 JP>

    visible = true;

  }
</Custom Show Eval>
